Draggable Windows

Draggable windows (or other kinds of overlays) in Figma? No problem, thanks to frames' overflow behavior property, which we can access under the Prototype tab.


About the video series

The Fun of Iterating with Figma is a short video series in which I'm sharing some of my personal favorite practices for working with Figma. I'm mostly focusing on fast iteration, detaching fewer components, and — in general — being more aligned with code through the use of layers & component architecture.


All of the past and upcoming videos can be found on my YouTube Channel and my Twitter account, @AdamPrzewoski.


Rather than being a tutor, I'd love to sparkle the discussion on how we use Figma on daily basis. I'd love to get your perspectives on my methods and get you to share yours so that we can learn from each other.
